categories: Category:Ships of the Open Circle Fleet

nodes.text: The Galactic Guardian was an Acclamator-class assault ship used by the Republic during the Clone Wars, and later by the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War.

The Galactic Guardian first saw service in the Republic Navy during the Clone Wars, where it was adorned with lateral red markings port and starboard of the centerline, and wore the symbol of the Open Circle Fleet.
Galactic Guardian later served in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War.
